name: ESCAPE: Ancient Greece
description:
- Best played from downloaded executable -

Controls:

Move: A, D or LEFT, RIGHT

Jump: W or SPACE or UP

Spear Throw: E or LMB

You must escape Ancient Greece. You can throw a spear or jump on your enemies to kill them.

There are only 2 levels at present, as I wanted to test using 3D in a game for the first time. Hope you enjoy!

Created for the Godot Wild Jam #42 - Theme: Ancient
